title: The Atlantic community: introducing Greece
creator_credit: Europa Telefilm, North Atlantic Treaty Organization and Vittorio Gallo
brief_description: Describes the country and the people of Greece - geographical features, historical development and achievements, economic life, occupations of the people and social customs. Explains briefly the role of Greece in NATO.
